short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily Schedule a Berst conference in a Google calendar invite!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Berst Calendar scheduler allows you to store your default Berst meeting location so that you can add it as a location with a single click.
